column2: 1. To what extent did you feel that the glove control was easy to pick up? (1-5)
column3: 2. At any point did you find yourself become so involved that you were unaware you were using controls? (1-5)
column4: 3. To what extent did you feel that the counterweight mass perception was realistic? (1-5)
column5: 4. To what extent did you feel that the haptic feedback added to the experience? (1-5)
